Name: RetainerTrack Expanded
Author: SicakBirTebessum, Liza Carvelli
Description: Keeps track of players and who a retainer belongs to. Alt characters can also be tracked if they have been seen before. --Currently only for whitelisted players.
Changelog:
- Added context menu. You can now easily search for other players by right-clicking in various menus. (E.g. friends list, party list, player search, linkshells, party finder lists, blacklisted players, and many other areas)
- UI has been improved. Unnecessary elements have been removed, and the interface has been simplified.
- Fixed the issue with syncing the server and local database.
- Fixed the issue where Retainer owners' names were not displayed when viewing items on the marketboard.
